description.en: Build a robot that can lift up a cup from your kit. Place 4 cups in the 4 squares of your challenge field. Lift them up and carry them to the center of the field one by one. Stack them up by putting them into each other.

Start your robot from the start line.
Pick up one cup at a time.
You have got 3 trials.

You finished within 10 minutes = Good job! Let's try again.
You finished within 7 minutes. = Wow! Excellent job! Another try?
You finished in under 5 minutes. = You are such a pro!
Bonus task: Can you do the same by programming your robot?

Let's count your points.
Finished within 10 minutes. = 5 points
Finished within 7 minutes. = 10 points
Finished in under 5 minutes. = 15 points
We would love to see your scores.
